# Collections Docs

## Collections and data structures

- [Overview](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/standard/collections/index.md): Learn how to use collections and data structures in .NET. Use generic and non-generic collections in thread-safe operations.
- [Select a collection class](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/standard/collections/selecting-a-collection-class.md): Learn how to decide which collection class in .NET to choose. Using the wrong type can restrict your use of the collection.
- [Commonly used collection types](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/standard/collections/commonly-used-collection-types.md): Learn about commonly used collection types in .NET, such as hash tables, queues, stacks, bags, dictionaries, and lists.
- [When to use generic collections](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/standard/collections/when-to-use-generic-collections.md): Learn more about: When to use generic collections
- [Comparisons and sorts within collections](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/standard/collections/comparisons-and-sorts-within-collections.md): Do comparisons & sorts using the System.Collections classes in .NET, which help in finding an element to remove or returning the value of a key-and-value pair.
- [Sorted collection types](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/standard/collections/sorted-collection-types.md): Learn more about: Sorted Collection Types
- [Hashtable and Dictionary types](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/standard/collections/hashtable-and-dictionary-collection-types.md): Learn more about: Hashtable and Dictionary Collection Types

## Children

- [Thread Safe](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/standard/collections/thread-safe/llms.txt)
